quiz.question: Finish the famous movie quote: "You're gonna need a bigger ____." (Jaws).
Finish the quote: "You're gonna need a bigger boat" was originally delivered in response to what?
Finish the quote: "Say hello to my little friend!" — which prop became iconic?
Finish the famous movie quote: "Here's looking at you, ____" is followed by what name?
Finish the quote: "I'm the king of the world!" Who directed the film that includes this line?
Finish the quote: "I'll be back" — what was the script originally intending instead?
Finish the famous movie quote: "Houston, we have a ____." (Apollo 13).
Finish the quote: "The first rule of Fight Club is: you do not talk about ____."
Finish the quote: "My precious" — which actor voiced Gollum in both motion capture and voice?
Finish the famous movie quote: "Bond. James Bond." What does this emphasize?
Finish the quote: "Here's Johnny!" was ad-libbed by which actor?
Finish the quote: "Here's looking at you, kid" — what literary device does the line primarily use?
Finish the famous movie quote: "Say hello to my little ____!" (Scarface).
Finish the quote: "I'll be back" was first spoken by which actor?
Finish the quote: "Give me the ____" — which film features the line 'Give me the ring' as a pivotal moment?
options: Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
quiz.answer: Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
